testsuite.name: repositires.EmployeeRepositoryTest
testsuite.system-out:
Hibernate:
drop table if exists employee Hibernate:
create table employee ( emp_id bigint not null auto_increment, emp_email varchar(200) not null, emp_name varchar(200) not null, emp_phone varchar(200) not null, emp_salary double precision, primary key (emp_id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: insert into employee (emp_email, emp_name, emp_phone, emp_salary) values (?, ?, ?, ?) Employee{id=1, name='Ahmed', email='Ahmed@gmail.com', salary=20.0, phone='123456'} Hibernate:
drop table if exists employee Hibernate:
create table employee ( emp_id bigint not null auto_increment, emp_email varchar(200) not null, emp_name varchar(200) not null, emp_phone varchar(200) not null, emp_salary double precision, primary key (emp_id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: insert into employee (emp_email, emp_name, emp_phone, emp_salary) values (?, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: select employee0_.emp_id as emp_id1_0_, employee0_.emp_email as emp_emai2_0_, employee0_.emp_name as emp_name3_0_, employee0_.emp_phone as emp_phon4_0_, employee0_.emp_salary as emp_sala5_0_ from employee employee0_ where employee0_.emp_id is not null Hibernate: delete from employee where emp_id=1 Hibernate:
drop table if exists employee Hibernate:
create table employee ( emp_id bigint not null auto_increment, emp_email varchar(200) not null, emp_name varchar(200) not null, emp_phone varchar(200) not null, emp_salary double precision, primary key (emp_id) ) engine=InnoDB Hibernate: insert into employee (emp_email, emp_name, emp_phone, emp_salary) values (?, ?, ?, ?) Hibernate: update employee set emp_email=?, emp_name=?, emp_phone=?, emp_salary=? where emp_id=? Hibernate: select employee0_.emp_id as emp_id1_0_0_, employee0_.emp_email as emp_emai2_0_0_, employee0_.emp_name as emp_name3_0_0_, employee0_.emp_phone as emp_phon4_0_0_, employee0_.emp_salary as emp_sala5_0_0_ from employee employee0_ where employee0_.emp_id=?
